title: Luxury 1 Bed, 1 Bath. in Hudson Yards. W/D in-unit & Views! 1 Month Fr
posting_body: ['Luxury 1 Bed, 1 Bath.', 'in Hudson Yards.', 'W/D in-unit & Views!', '1 Month Free!', 'Sara Lebbos', 'Phone: 347-753-0776', 'Mobile: 347-753-0776', 'Fax: 212-227-1120', 'Email: <URL>', 'Listing ID #: 138657', 'Price: $5,523', 'Property Type: Apartment', 'Bedrooms: 1.0', 'Bathrooms: 1.0', 'Pets: Pets OK', 'Building Amenities', 'Doorman', 'Elevator', 'Health Club', 'Subway', 'Laundry', 'Bicycle Room', 'Storage', 'Roof Deck', 'Wheelchair Access', 'Receiving Room', 'Apartment Amenities', 'Dining Room', 'Dishwasher', 'Washer', 'Hardwood', 'High Ceilings', 'Renovated', 'Marble Bath', 'Granite Kitchen', 'Light', 'Eat In Kitchen', 'Laundry In Unit', 'Stainless Steel Appliances', 'Free Rent', 'Welcome to this spacious, 1 bedroom / 1 bathroom apartment with condo-level finishes!', 'Home features floor-to-ceiling windows with beautiful city views, Oak Wood Flooring, Chrome Grohe Fixtures, and in-unit washer/dryer for your convenience!', 'The island, gourmet kitchen displays luxury features with Stainless Steel Bertazzoni Appliances, Quartz Countertops & Backsplash, Wood-Paneled Dishwasher, in-Cabinet Microwave and Custom Cabinetry with Under-Cabinet Lighting!', 'The spa-like bathroom includes Overhead & Handheld Shower Fixtures, Floating Shelving in Bath, Illuminated Vanity Mirror, Spacious Medicine Cabinet and Porcelain Tiling.', 'Building offers extravagant amenities: 24-hour Attended Lobby, Glow Fitness Center, Sky Lounge with Catering Kitchen, Stellar Game Room with Billiards, Resident Lounge, Solarium Co-Working Space, Squash Court, Golf Simulator, Pet Washing Room, Valet Services, Bicycle/Storage Available, Furnished Roof Deck with Private Cabanas & BBQ Grills, and Panoramic River/City Views!', 'Listed rent is net effective rent, based on a gross rent of $6025.00 and 1 Month Free', 'Sara Lebbos', 'Phone: 347-753-0776', 'Mobile: 347-753-0776', 'Fax: 212-227-1120', 'Email: <URL>', 'New York Living Solutions - Keller Williams New York City \xa0 347-753-0776 \xa0 347-753-0776 \xa0 FAX 212-227-1120 \xa0 <URL>', 'POSTED BY REALTYMX™', 'To view, call or text Sara Lebbos at 347-753-0776']
